Text.Page:
Care to test your mettle in the Champions' Skyring? The best and bravest soldiers from around the federation face each other for glory...and other perquisites.

You need only a few allies you can trust, a bit of gumption, and a thirst for battle.

Ready for a fight?
Excellent! What magnificent valor! This is but one step. If you choose, great glories—and challenges—await you in future matches. As your skills improve, so do your opponents.
